    Autobiography
     I am Gennalyn Q. Soriano, a BSCS student batch 2022 from University of the Philippines - Los Baños.

    I was born in Davao City and grew up in Marikina City. I went to Calamba, Laguna during my 7th grade due to certain circumstances and spent 2 years there before going to San Mateo, Rizal then to Quezon City to finish my high school years back in Marikina. I now live in Women's Residence Hall, Batong Malake, Los Baños to study in UPLB.

    I am the eldest of three sisters. I was a consistent honor student and was sent to various academic events during my 10th grade.
